hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Abbas:The person about whom Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "If I were to take a Khalil from this nation (my followers), then I would have taken him (i.e., Abu Bakr), but the Islamic Brotherhood is better (or said: good)," regarded a grandfather as the father himself (in inheritance)

chapter.ara-name: باب مِيرَاثِ الْجَدِّ مَعَ الأَبِ وَالإِخْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: The shares of inheritance for the paternal grandfather, the father and brothers
